rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Screw_1
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A general class for all types of screws, including variations in design and function.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Body_2
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: The segment of a screw that is threaded or unthreaded, utilized for fastening different materials together.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Wood_screw_3
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A screw designed for securing wood, featuring a sharp point and coarse threads to enhance grip in timber.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Self_tapping_screw_4
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A type of screw that can create its own hole in a material as it is driven in, usually made of soft metal or plastic.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Machine_screw_5
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A screw designed to fasten machine parts together, typically using a nut, often with a cylindrical head.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Lag_screw_6
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A heavy-duty screw with a large diameter, mainly used for woods and other thick materials, characterized by its hexagonal head.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Bone_screw_7
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A specialized screw designed for surgical procedures to affix bones together securely.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Head_8
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: The top part of a screw, varying in shape and design, which can interact with different tools for application.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Pan_head_9
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A screw head that is slightly rounded and allows for a greater surface area for fastening.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Flat_head_10
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A screw head that countersinks into the material to provide a flush finish, often used in woodworking.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Truss_head_11
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A screw head with a broad, flat design that distributes load over a larger surface area.
rdf:RDF.rdfs:label: Socket_head_12
rdf:RDF.rdfs:comment: A cylindrical head designed for use with a hexagon socket wrench for greater torque application.

owl:DataProperty.rdfs:label: hasThreadType_13
owl:DataProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of thread present on the screw (e.g., coarse, fine).

owl:DataProperty.rdfs:label: hasMaterial_14
owl:DataProperty.rdfs:comment: Material used in making the screw (e.g., steel, plastic).

owl:DataProperty.rdfs:label: hasDiameter_15
owl:DataProperty.rdfs:comment: Diameter of the screw, typically measured in millimeters.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasBody_16
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates a screw to its body component, defining the structural element of the screw's body.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasHeadType_17
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a screw to its specific head design, detailing the interaction surface for tools.
